answers.answer: I had a csection with my first because I was too ill with it, they were afraid an iduction would raise my bp even more, and baby wasn't ready for labour as he'd stopped growing. This time they are going to do another csection even tho its milder this time because they don't want my bp to rise any further and I don't want to try for a vbac.

question: Does anyone know the percentage of preeclampsia suffers who have to have c sections?  I'm just trying to get an idea on if I'm looking at a c section.
title: Preeclampsia and csections
